title.narrative: Growth Resources Opportunities and Wealth creation in Bihar

description.narrative: This activity (Growth Resources Opportunities and Wealth creation in Bihar) is a component of Growth, Resources, Opportunities and Wealth Creation in Bihar (GROW Bihar) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,999,996. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM). , with the following implementing partners: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India LLP, IPE Global Private Limited, PwC India. The start date is 16-07-2014 and the end date is 15-07-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
